name: Cyberscape (itch)
description: Cyberscape is a cooperative platformer videogame set in a distant cyberpunk future. In this game, two players must work together to escape the police after a bank heist and reach your getaway vehicle. Players can run and jump, as well as use a unique mechanic to send a grappling hook towards the other player. The player that sent the grappling hook is then launched towards it! Can you make it to the end?
